languages.text: В ту же секунду, словно действуя в едином порыве, сервиторы — все без исключения! — шагнули навстречу Лорд-капитану. С пугающей точностью они повторили {mf|его|ее} движение. Вольный Торговец замер{mf||ла} на месте и, недолго думая, взмахнул{mf||а} рукой — действуя одновременно, сервиторы повторили и это движение. Когда Лорд-капитан с немым вопросом в глазах обернул{mf|ся|ась} к техноматам, сервиторы, словно передразнивая {mf|его|ее}, отразили и этот жест.

traits.locale_text: В ту же секунду, словно действуя в едином порыве, сервиторы — все без исключения! — шагнули навстречу Лорд-капитану. С пугающей точностью они повторили {mf|его|ее} движение. Вольный Торговец замер{mf||ла} на месте и, недолго думая, взмахнул{mf||ла} рукой — действуя одновременно, сервиторы повторили и это движение. Когда Лорд-капитан с немым вопросом в глазах обернул{mf|ся|ась} к техноматам, сервиторы, словно передразнивая {mf|его|ее}, отразили и этот жест.

languages.text: Immediately, the servitors — each and every one of them — stepped toward the Lord Captain in perfect unison. They mimicked {mf|his|her} movements with frightening precision. The Rogue Trader halted in place and, after a moment's thought, waved {mf|his|her} hand — and the servitors, just as synchronously, repeated that gesture as well. When the Lord Captain turned quizzically to the technomats, so did the servitors, as if mocking {mf|him|her}.
languages.original_text: В ту же секунду, словно действуя в едином порыве, сервиторы — все без исключения! — шагнули навстречу Лорд-капитану. С пугающей точностью они повторили {mf|его|ее} движение. Вольный Торговец замер{mf||ла} на месте и, недолго думая, взмахнул{mf||а} рукой — действуя одновременно, сервиторы повторили и это движение. Когда Лорд-капитан с немым вопросом в глазах обернул{mf|ся|ась} к техноматам, сервиторы, словно передразнивая {mf|его|ее}, отразили и этот жест.

When the Lord Captain turned quizzically to the technomats, so did the servitors, as if mocking {mf|him|her}.

The Rogue Trader halted in place and, after a moment's thought, waved {mf|his|her} hand — and the servitors, just as synchronously, repeated that gesture as well. When the Lord Captain turned quizzically to the technomats, so did the servitors, as if mocking {mf|him|her}.

The Rogue Trader halted in place and, after a moment's thought, waved {mf|his|her} hand — and the servitors, just as synchronously, repeated that gesture as well. When the Lord Captain turned quizzically to the technomats, so did the servitors, as if mocking {mf|him|her}.

Immediately, the servitors — each and every one of them — stepped toward the Lord Captain in perfect unison. They mimicked {mf|his|her} movements with frightening precision. The Rogue Trader halted in place and, after a moment's thought, waved {mf|his|her} hand — and the servitors, just as synchronously, repeated that gesture as well. When the Lord Captain turned quizzically to the technomats, so did the servitors, as if mocking {mf|him|her}.

languages.text: サーヴィターたちはすぐさま、その一体一体がロード・キャプテンの元に歩み寄るかのように、完璧な一体感で動きだした。奴らは恐ろしいほどの精度で{mf|彼|彼女}の動きを模倣した。自由開拓者は立ち止まり、少し考えた後、手を振った。サーヴィターたちもまた、真似ているかのように、同期してその動きを繰り返した。ロード・キャプテンがテクノマットたちに不思議そうな表情で振り向いたとき、サーヴィターたちも同じように、まるで{mf|彼|彼女}を嘲笑しているかのように、振り返った。
languages.original_text: Immediately, the servitors — each and every one of them — stepped toward the Lord Captain in perfect unison. They mimicked {mf|his|her} movements with frightening precision. The Rogue Trader halted in place and, after a moment's thought, waved {mf|his|her} hand — and the servitors, just as synchronously, repeated that gesture as well. When the Lord Captain turned quizzically to the technomats, so did the servitors, as if mocking {mf|him|her}.

traits.locale_text: サーヴィターたちはすぐさま、その一体一体がロード・キャプテンの元に歩み寄るかのように、完璧な一体感で動きだした。奴らは恐ろしいほどの精度で{mf|彼|彼女}の動きを模倣した。自由開拓者は立ち止まり、少し考えた後、手を振った。サーヴィターたちもまた、真似ているかのように、同期してその動きを繰り返した。ロード・キャプテンがテクノマットたちに不思議そうな表情で振り向いたとき、サーヴィターたちも同じように、まるで{mf|彼|彼女}を嘲笑しているかのように、振り返った。

languages.text: Instantanément et à l'unisson, chacun des servitors fit un pas en direction {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}, imitant ses mouvements avec une précision glaçante. {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} se figea et, après un instant de réflexion, fit un geste de la main que les servitors répétèrent avec la même synchronisation. Quand {mf|il|elle} se tourna pour lancer un regard interrogateur aux technomates, les semi-machines firent de même, comme pour se moquer {mf|de lui|d'elle}.
languages.original_text: Immediately, the servitors — each and every one of them — stepped toward the Lord Captain in perfect unison. They mimicked {mf|his|her} movements with frightening precision. The Rogue Trader halted in place and, after a moment's thought, waved {mf|his|her} hand — and the servitors, just as synchronously, repeated that gesture as well. When the Lord Captain turned quizzically to the technomats, so did the servitors, as if mocking {mf|him|her}.

traits.locale_text: Instantanément et à l'unisson, chacun des servitors fit un pas en direction {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}, imitant ses mouvements avec une précision glaçante. {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} se figea et, après un instant de réflexion, fit un geste de la main que les servitors répétèrent avec la même synchronisation. Quand {mf|il|elle} se tourna pour lancer un regard interrogateur aux technomates, les semi-machines firent de même, comme pour se moquer {mf|de lui|d'elle}.

languages.text: 在那一瞬间，所有机仆迈着整齐划一的步伐，一起走向了舰长大人。他们准确无误地模仿着舰长大人的动作，令所有人胆战心惊。舰长大人停在原地，思索片刻，随后挥了挥手，而那些机仆也都同样重复着这样的手势。当舰长大人疑惑地看着技工时，那些机仆也同样转过了头，像是在嘲笑{mf|他|她}一样。
languages.original_text: Immediately, the servitors — each and every one of them — stepped toward the Lord Captain in perfect unison. They mimicked {mf|his|her} movements with frightening precision. The Rogue Trader halted in place and, after a moment's thought, waved {mf|his|her} hand — and the servitors, just as synchronously, repeated that gesture as well. When the Lord Captain turned quizzically to the technomats, so did the servitors, as if mocking {mf|him|her}.

traits.locale_text: 在那一瞬间，所有奴工迈着整齐划一的步伐，一起走向了舰长大人。他们准确无误地模仿着舰长大人的动作，令所有人胆战心惊。舰长大人停在原地，思索片刻，随后挥了挥手，而那些奴工也都同样重复着这样的手势。当舰长大人疑惑地看着技工时，那些奴工也同样转过了头，像是在嘲笑{mf|他|她}一样。

languages.text: De inmediato, los servidores (todos y cada uno de ellos) dieron un paso al unísono hacia {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán. Imitaron sus movimientos con una precisión inquietante. {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente se detuvo en seco y, tras un momento, agitó la mano... gesto que los servidores repitieron con la misma sincronía. Cuando {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán se giró hacia los tecnómatas en busca de respuestas, los servidores hicieron lo mismo, como burlándose de {mf|él|ella}.
languages.original_text: Immediately, the servitors — each and every one of them — stepped toward the Lord Captain in perfect unison. They mimicked {mf|his|her} movements with frightening precision. The Rogue Trader halted in place and, after a moment's thought, waved {mf|his|her} hand — and the servitors, just as synchronously, repeated that gesture as well. When the Lord Captain turned quizzically to the technomats, so did the servitors, as if mocking {mf|him|her}.

traits.locale_text: De inmediato, los servidores (todos y cada uno de ellos) dieron un paso al unísono hacia {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán. Imitaron sus movimientos con una precisión inquietante. {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente se detuvo en seco y, tras un momento, agitó la mano... gesto que los servidores repitieron con la misma sincronía. Cuando {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán se giró hacia los tecnómatas en busca de respuestas, los servidores hicieron lo mismo, como burlándose de {mf|él|ella}.

languages.text: Unverzüglich traten die Servitoren allesamt in perfektem Gleichschritt auf den Lord Captain zu. Sie spiegelten seine Bewegungen mit beängstigender Präzision. {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} blieb stehen, dachte kurz nach, winkte dann kurz mit {mf|seiner|ihrer} Hand — und die Servitoren ahmten auch diese Geste vollkommen synchron nach. Als der Lord Captain sich mit fragendem Blick zu den Technomat umdrehte, taten die Servitoren es {mf|ihm gleich, als würden sie ihn|ihr gleich, als würden sie sie} nachäffen.
languages.original_text: Immediately, the servitors — each and every one of them — stepped toward the Lord Captain in perfect unison. They mimicked {mf|his|her} movements with frightening precision. The Rogue Trader halted in place and, after a moment's thought, waved {mf|his|her} hand — and the servitors, just as synchronously, repeated that gesture as well. When the Lord Captain turned quizzically to the technomats, so did the servitors, as if mocking {mf|him|her}.

traits.locale_text: Unverzüglich traten die Servitoren allesamt in perfektem Gleichschritt auf den Lord Captain zu. Sie spiegelten seine Bewegungen mit beängstigender Präzision. {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} blieb stehen, dachte kurz nach, winkte dann kurz mit {mf|seiner|ihrer} Hand — und die Servitoren ahmten auch diese Geste vollkommen synchron nach. Als der Lord Captain sich mit fragendem Blick zu den Technomat umdrehte, taten die Servitoren es {mf|ihm gleich, als würden sie ihn|ihr gleich, als würden sie sie} nachäffen.

languages.text: Hemen ardından hizmetörler, mükemmel bir uyum içinde Lord Kaptan'a doğru yürüdü. Korkunç bir hassasiyetle onun hareketlerini taklit etmeye başladılar. Hür Tacir olduğu yerde durup bir müddet düşündükten sonra elini salladı. Hizmetörler ahenk içinde bu hareketi de taklit ettiler. Lord Kaptan merakla teknomatlara döndüğünde hizmetörler de onu alaya alır gibi aynısını yaptı.
languages.original_text: Immediately, the servitors — each and every one of them — stepped toward the Lord Captain in perfect unison. They mimicked {mf|his|her} movements with frightening precision. The Rogue Trader halted in place and, after a moment's thought, waved {mf|his|her} hand — and the servitors, just as synchronously, repeated that gesture as well. When the Lord Captain turned quizzically to the technomats, so did the servitors, as if mocking {mf|him|her}.

Hür Tacir olduğu yerde durup bir müddet düşündükten sonra elini salladı. Hizmetörler ahenk içinde bu hareketi de taklit ettiler. Lord Kaptan merakla teknomatlara döndüğünde hizmetörler de onu alaya alır gibi aynısını yaptı.
